recommendations: Peter McGilchrist
Founder and CEO of 333 Ventures
September 11, 2014, Gower was senior to Peter but didn’t manage directly

Gower demonstrated an oft-unseen skill-set in drawing together the numerous key stakeholders in taking new products to market, and all-the-while generating a great depth of loyalty and enthusiasm amongst his direct staff and colleagues alike.Of a rare breed with his vision and yet humble determination in achieving positive market-development results, I await with interest as to his future focus and undoubted news of further achievements.

Gerald Fabrot
Partners Solution Consultant at Adobe Japan
January 6, 2014, Gower managed Gerald directly

Gerald is one of the smartest people I've worked with.  He embraces technology, especially if it helps connect people and improve lives (or is really cool).  Gerald is extremely analytical of facts and data; he is a team player and he is totally transparent - no surprises.  On more than one occasion traditional Japanese people stopped us on the street to remark that Gerald's Japanese grammar and pronunciation was more perfect than most Japanese!  Gerald is someone that I care to stay in touch with and I expect some day to see him involved in a key role in a highly successful start-up or growth company.

summary: Founder of 5 high growth technology companies, each of which has attained a leadership market-share position in its sector.  Small investor in a number of tech start-ups.Specialties: Understanding a market need and seeing ahead how technology can be applied to develop a compelling business model and go to market strategy, and executing that vision.
